resources.string: Could not disconnect authentication method without a backup method.
Please enter a valid E-Mail, that is not already associated with a habitica account.
Enjoy having fun getting things done
This is a unique name you can change later at any time!
You must be new here. I’m Justin, I’ll be your guide in Habitica.\n\nSo how would you like to look? Don’t worry, you can change this later.
Looking good! Now, choose any categories you’d like to work on and we’ll create a few tasks to get started.\n\nWe’ll go to your task board after this!

Habitica uses data from your device to analyze performance, handle support requests, and provide you with the best possible gamified experience. To do that, we need to request the following permissions. \n\nYou can change this at any time. To learn more, review our Privacy Policy.
This is used to improve the user experience, performance, and services of Habitica. Our support team will also use this when handling requests and bug reports.
This is necessary data required by our app to function. This includes data like your preferences saved in settings as well as crash information.

"Habitica uses data from your device to analyze performance, handle support requests, and provide you with the best possible gamified experience. To do that, we need to request the following permissions. "
